scripts.lint:committed: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- '**/*.ts' '**/*.tsx' '**/*.js' '**/*.jsx') ]]; then eslint --fix --no-inline-config $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- '**/*.ts' '**/*.tsx' '**/*.js' '**/*.jsx'); fi
scripts.lint:committed:abg-api: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-api/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-api/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-api/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-api/**/*.jsx') ]]; then eslint --no-inline-config $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-api/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-api/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-api/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-api/**/*.jsx'); fi
scripts.lint:committed:abg-common: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-common/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-common/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-common/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-common/**/*.jsx') ]]; then eslint --no-inline-config $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-common/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-common/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-common/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-common/**/*.jsx'); fi
scripts.lint:committed:abg-core-ui: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.jsx') ]]; then eslint --no-inline-config $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-core-ui/**/*.jsx'); fi
scripts.lint:committed:abg-data-layer: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.jsx') ]]; then eslint --no-inline-config $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.ts' 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.tsx' 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.js' 'libs/abg-data-layer/**/*.jsx'); fi
scripts.lint:committed:global-mobileapp: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.ts' 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.tsx' 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.js' 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.jsx') ]]; then eslint --no-inline-config $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.ts' 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.tsx' 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.js' 'apps/global-mobileapp/**/*.jsx'); fi
scripts.format:check:committed: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- '*.ts' '*.tsx' '*.js' '*.jsx') ]]; then nx format:check --files $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- '*.ts' '*.tsx' '*.js' '*.jsx'); fi
scripts.format:write:committed: if [[ -n $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- '*.ts' '*.tsx' '*.js' '*.jsx') ]]; then nx format:write --files $(git diff --name-only --relative develop...HEAD -- '*.ts' '*.tsx' '*.js' '*.jsx'); fi
scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules&& yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.run-storybook: nx run abg-storybook:storybook && nx run abg-storybook:run-ios
scripts.ios:clean: yarn projectPath &&yarn node:clean &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn ios:Pod:Reset
scripts.ios:Pod:install: yarn projectPath && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: yarn projectPath && react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.iOS:NAMavis: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && npx nx run-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='NAMavis'
scripts.iOS:NAMbudget: yarn setNAMbudget && yarn copy:nam-budget && npx nx run-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='NAMbudget'
scripts.iOS:EMEAavis: yarn setEMEAavis && yarn copy:emea-avis && npx nx run-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='EMEAavis'
scripts.iOS:EMEAbudget: yarn setEMEAbudget && yarn copy:emea-budget && npx nx run-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='EMEAbudget'
scripts.iOS:NAMavis:build: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && npx nx build-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='NAMavis'
scripts.iOS:NAMbudget:build: yarn setNAMbudget && yarn copy:nam-budget && npx nx build-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='NAMbudget'
scripts.iOS:EMEAavis:build: yarn setEMEAavis && yarn copy:emea-avis && npx nx build-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='EMEAavis'
scripts.iOS:EMEAbudget:build: yarn setEMEAbudget && yarn copy:emea-budget && npx nx build-ios global-mobileapp --scheme='EMEAbudget'
scripts.android:NAMavis: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && npx nx run-android global-mobileapp --mode='NAMavisDebug'
scripts.android:NAMbudget: yarn setNAMbudget && yarn copy:nam-budget && npx nx run-android global-mobileapp --mode='NAMbudgetDebug'
scripts.android:EMEAavis: yarn setEMEAavis && yarn copy:emea-avis &&  npx nx run-android global-mobileapp --mode='EMEAavisDebug'
scripts.android:EMEAbudget: yarn setEMEAbudget && yarn copy:emea-budget && npx nx run-android global-mobileapp --mode='EMEAbudgetDebug'
scripts.android:NAMavis:build: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && npx nx build-android global-mobileapp --mode='NAMavisDebug'
scripts.android:NAMbudget:build: yarn setNAMbudget && yarn copy:nam-budget && npx nx build-android global-mobileapp --mode='NAMbudgetDebug'
scripts.android:EMEAavis:build: yarn setEMEAavis && yarn copy:emea-avis && npx nx build-android global-mobileapp --mode='EMEAavisDebug'
scripts.android:EMEAbudget:build: yarn setEMEAbudget && yarn copy:emea-budget && npx nx build-android global-mobileapp --mode='EMEAbudgetDebug'
scripts.APK: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && fastlane beta appName:'NAMavis' mode:'release'
scripts.APK:NAMavis: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && fastlane beta appName:'NAMavis' mode:'release'
scripts.APK:NAMbudget: yarn setNAMbudget && yarn copy:nam-budget && fastlane beta appName:'NAMbudget' mode:'release'
scripts.APK:EMEAavis: yarn setEMEAavis && yarn copy:emea-avis && fastlane beta appName:'EMEAavis' mode:'release'
scripts.APK:EMEAbudget: yarn setEMEAbudget && yarn copy:emea-budget && fastlane beta appName:'EMEAbudget' mode:'release'
scripts.IPA: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && fastlane ios beta schemeName:'NAMavis' mode:'Enterprise'
scripts.IPA:NAMavis: yarn setNAMavis && yarn copy:nam-avis && fastlane ios beta schemeName:'NAMavis' mode:'Enterprise'
scripts.IPA:NAMbudget: yarn setNAMbudget && yarn copy:nam-budget && fastlane ios beta schemeName:'NAMbudget' mode:'Enterprise'
scripts.IPA:EMEAavis: yarn setEMEAavis && yarn copy:emea-avis && fastlane ios beta schemeName:'EMEAavis' mode:'Enterprise'
scripts.IPA:EMEAbudget: yarn setEMEAbudget && yarn copy:emea-budget && fastlane ios beta schemeName:'EMEAbudget' mode:'Enterprise'
